channel.title: Need help codeing I have no idea what...(please reply)
channel.description:
Hello, I was wondering if anyone kind enough would help me with codeing. (npc's that actualy do somthing, interactable objects, monsters that fight back, other cool features, ect...) The only things I know how to do is how to spawn myself items, teleport, walk through walls and spawn useless npc's that just stand there and do nothing but die even if the hit count says "0". So if you can help make neat custom shops and help to make a nice server with a growing community and a 24/7 server at least 98 % of the time then go to this IP address or contact me by this E-mail to guide me through this step by step
E-mail== lord_white_0@yahoo.ca
IP===== 127.0.0.1
I don't think I have a hamchi thing or whatever it is so dont worry about that...unless me not having it is a bad thing.
